opcionesCorrectas: The officers had grave concerns about the lifeboats would not be capable of holding so many passengers.

pregunta: Which of the following are true statements about the paleolithic diet?
opcionesCorrectas: It has little proven health benefits.
Our human ancestors probably ate more than what is included in today’s “paleolithic” diet.
opcionesIncorrectas: It is based on what our human ancestors ate.
It is adapted to the digestion of modern humans.

opcionesIncorrectas: Nefertiti is the most famous queen in Egypt’s history.
